tool.name: Valley and Ridge Detection (Top Hat Approach)
tool.description: Calculating fuzzy valley and ridge class memberships using the Top Hat approach. Based on the AML script 'tophat' by Jochen Schmidt, Landcare Research. <br/><br/>References:<br/>Rodriguez, F., Maire, E., Courjault-Rad'e, P., Darrozes, J. (2002): The Black Top Hat function applied to a DEM: a tool to estimate recent incision in a mountainous watershed. (Estib`ere Watershed, Central Pyrenees). Geophysical Research Letters, 29(6), 9-1 - 9-4.<br/>

param.name: RADIUS_VALLEY
param.label: Valley Radius
param.help: radius given in map units used to fill valleys

param.name: RADIUS_HILL
param.label: Hill Radius
param.help: radius given in map units used to cut hills

param.name: THRESHOLD
param.label: Elevation Threshold
param.help: elevation threshold used to identify hills/valleys
